@package har
@version 0.1.1.0

module HAR.QueryString
data QueryString
QueryString :: Text -> Text -> Maybe Text -> QueryString
name :: QueryString -> Text
value :: QueryString -> Text
comment :: QueryString -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON QueryString
instance ToJSON QueryString
instance Show QueryString

module HAR.Param
data Param
Param :: Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Param
name :: Param -> Text
value :: Param -> Maybe Text
fileName :: Param -> Maybe Text
contentType :: Param -> Maybe Text
comment :: Param -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Param
instance ToJSON Param
instance Show Param

module HAR.PostData
data PostData
PostData :: Text -> [Param] -> Text -> Maybe Text -> PostData
mimeType :: PostData -> Text
params :: PostData -> [Param]
text :: PostData -> Text
comment :: PostData -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON PostData
instance ToJSON PostData
instance Show PostData

module HAR.PageTimings
data PageTimings
PageTimings :: Maybe Integer -> Maybe Integer -> Maybe Text -> PageTimings
onContentLoad :: PageTimings -> Maybe Integer
onLoad :: PageTimings -> Maybe Integer
comment :: PageTimings -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON PageTimings
instance ToJSON PageTimings
instance Show PageTimings

module HAR.Page
data Page
Page :: Text -> Text -> Text -> PageTimings -> Maybe Text -> Page
startedDateTime :: Page -> Text
id :: Page -> Text
title :: Page -> Text
pageTimings :: Page -> PageTimings
comment :: Page -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Page
instance ToJSON Page
instance Show Page

module HAR.Header
data Header
Header :: Text -> Text -> Maybe Text -> Header
name :: Header -> Text
value :: Header -> Text
comment :: Header -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Header
instance ToJSON Header
instance Show Header

module HAR.Timings
data Timings
Timings :: Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> Maybe Text -> Timings
blocked :: Timings -> Integer
dns :: Timings -> Integer
connect :: Timings -> Integer
send :: Timings -> Integer
wait :: Timings -> Integer
receive :: Timings -> Integer
ssl :: Timings -> Integer
comment :: Timings -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Timings
instance ToJSON Timings
instance Show Timings

module HAR.Creator
data Creator
Creator :: Text -> Text -> Maybe Text -> Creator
name :: Creator -> Text
version :: Creator -> Text
comment :: Creator -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Creator
instance ToJSON Creator
instance Show Creator

module HAR.Cookie
data Cookie
Cookie :: Text -> Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Cookie
name :: Cookie -> Text
value :: Cookie -> Text
path :: Cookie -> Maybe Text
domain :: Cookie -> Maybe Text
expires :: Cookie -> Maybe Text
httpOnly :: Cookie -> Maybe Bool
secure :: Cookie -> Maybe Bool
comment :: Cookie -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Cookie
instance ToJSON Cookie
instance Show Cookie

module HAR.Request
type URL = Text
data Request
Request :: Text -> URL -> Text -> [Cookie] -> [Header] -> [QueryString] -> Maybe PostData -> Integer -> Integer -> Maybe Text -> Request
method :: Request -> Text
url :: Request -> URL
httpVersion :: Request -> Text
cookies :: Request -> [Cookie]
headers :: Request -> [Header]
queryString :: Request -> [QueryString]
postData :: Request -> Maybe PostData
headersSize :: Request -> Integer
bodySize :: Request -> Integer
comment :: Request -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Request
instance ToJSON Request
instance Show Request

module HAR.Content
data Content
Content :: Integer -> Maybe Integer -> Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Content
size :: Content -> Integer
compression :: Content -> Maybe Integer
mimeType :: Content -> Text
text :: Content -> Maybe Text
encoding :: Content -> Maybe Text
comment :: Content -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Content
instance ToJSON Content
instance Show Content

module HAR.Response
data Response
Response :: Integer -> Text -> Text -> [Cookie] -> [Header] -> Content -> Text -> Integer -> Integer -> Maybe Text -> Response
status :: Response -> Integer
statusText :: Response -> Text
httpVersion :: Response -> Text
cookies :: Response -> [Cookie]
headers :: Response -> [Header]
content :: Response -> Content
redirectURL :: Response -> Text
headersSize :: Response -> Integer
bodySize :: Response -> Integer
comment :: Response -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Response
instance ToJSON Response
instance Show Response

module HAR.Cache
data Cache
Cache :: Maybe Text -> Cache
comment :: Cache -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Cache
instance ToJSON Cache
instance Show Cache

module HAR.Entry
data Entry
Entry :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Integer -> Request -> Response -> Maybe Cache -> Timings -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Entry
pageref :: Entry -> Maybe Text
startedDateTime :: Entry -> Text
time :: Entry -> Integer
request :: Entry -> Request
response :: Entry -> Response
cache :: Entry -> Maybe Cache
timings :: Entry -> Timings
serverIPAddress :: Entry -> Maybe Text
connection :: Entry -> Maybe Text
comment :: Entry -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Entry
instance ToJSON Entry
instance Show Entry

module HAR.Browser
data Browser
Browser :: Text -> Text -> Maybe Text -> Browser
name :: Browser -> Text
version :: Browser -> Text
comment :: Browser -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Browser
instance ToJSON Browser
instance Show Browser

module HAR.Log
data Log
Log :: Text -> Creator -> Browser -> [Page] -> [Entry] -> Maybe Text -> Log
version :: Log -> Text
creator :: Log -> Creator
browser :: Log -> Browser
pages :: Log -> [Page]
entries :: Log -> [Entry]
comment :: Log -> Maybe Text
instance FromJSON Log
instance ToJSON Log
instance Show Log

module HAR
data HAR
HAR :: Log -> HAR
log :: HAR -> Log
instance FromJSON HAR
instance ToJSON HAR
instance Show HAR
